author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jones Energy Forgoes Convertible Preferred Stock Dividend
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Jones Energy Inc:
* JONES ENERGY, INC. FORGOES CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK DIVIDEND
* JONES ENERGY INC - CONTINGENT DIVIDEND PAYMENT ON 8% SERIES A PERPETUAL CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK WILL NOT BE PAID Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
